segments.text: Good afternoon , you look a little stuck . Can I help ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The thing is , I've got all of this information here , all of these leaflets , but I can't make head nor tail of them !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . What is it exactly that you are interested in ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm not sure which would be better for me ; buying some insurance or putting my money in a Savings Deposit .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , that all depends on how much you want to invest .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I was thinking of around 10,000 RIB .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's a nice round figure to deal with ! OK , if you were to buy this insurance policy , your yearly fixed income from it would be 94.35 RIB .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: For the Savings Deposit you could actually get more . You see , in time deposit , the interest rate is 1.58 % after the 20 % interest tax . So , technically you could get more than a third more .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wow ! A third more ? Very good .
segments.speaker: S2
